Mod.name: Mould
Mod.description:
Mould
Aims to give incentives and rewards for hunting monsters and bosses.
Probably incompatible with with other biome mods.
What is Archaeology? If you dig in the desert in between the pyramid and the mountain, you can find a variety of items. Killing certain bosses will trigger the next tier of archaeological items to spawn. Tier 1 - spawns on world creation Tier 2 - when Spider Boss is killed Tier 3 - when Kolmi is killed Tier 4 - when Mecha Kolmi is killed Tier 5 - when Tiny is killed
Current Features: - 23 new wands to find - 4 new bosses (1 reborn boss, 2 minibosses and 1 actual boss) - 3 new starting wands - 2 new biomes - 5 new spells - 3rd Sun to make - 4 perks are now drops from specific enemies or bosses - Changes to 2 vanilla bosses - 5 tiers of Archaeology featuring 20 items - world generation changes - 1 new structure
Planned Features: - lake island miniboss to be more than just a copy paste of turso :p (shh im lazy) - new bosses with drops - drops for vanilla bosses - new biomes - a way to respawn bosses - more archaeology items
Github: https://github.com/mole-den/mould-n-noita Discord: https://discord.gg/JuRC6FqXkb
